title: Private Peaceful Furnished - Ext. Stay Apartment - Month to Month
neighborhood: S. Germantown @ i-385 (S. Germantown & Collierville, TN
map_address: Forrest Hill Irene near Shelby Dr
posting_body: Please text, or email because i can't answer unknown calls while working or helping family.
Month to month with No long-term contract required, but feel free to stay long-term.
Private entrance and private everything furnished apartment with everything you need.
Rent price is $694 + $196 for all utilities (water, electricity, cable TV, WI-FI internet) per month.
Just pay the first month to move in.

Included are a furnished Kitchenet for cooking and refrigerating, plus furnished Living Room with TV & WI-FI, Bedroom stuff, a full Bathroom, and all utilities (water, electricity, cable TV, WI-FI internet)
This is a tenet-at-will agreement so you can move out whenever you want.
Most guests decide to stay long-term.
On four acres of private property with two other private apartments, and nature all around.
The private apartments are attached to a private residence house.
Renters come and go privately, and are appreciated as people with lives to live.
Available so contact us to see your apartment!
